message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $1,100,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I recognize your budget constraints, the value of this product is undeniable.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.
